price: Rabbiin kaafiroota abaaree ibidda boba’aa isaaniif qopheessee jira.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
